snippet.title: Hive trailer - get it on Steam!
snippet.description:
This is the trailer for our first Steam game, Hive!  It is a licensed version of the Mensa Select award-winning board game that was made by Gen42 Games.

It is a two-player strategy game where the goal is to surround the opponent's Queen.

GET IT ON STEAM: http://store.steampowered.com/app/251210/
